Package: ai.vital.vitalsigns.java

[Java] Class VitalJavaSerializationUtils

    • ai.vital.vitalsigns.java.VitalJavaSerializationUtils

    • A class that fixes lots of issues related to pure single classloader serialization. Single classloader does not handle dynamic ontologies Replaces org.apache.commons.lang3.SerializationUtils.deserialize(byte[])

      Authors:
      Derek

        • public static java.lang.Object deserialize(java.io.InputStream inputStream)

          Deserializes a java object from input stream The stream will be closed once the object is written. This avoids the need for a finally clause, and maybe also exception handling, in the application code.

          Returns:
          Parameters:
          inputStream
